ENT001.name.description: The official name of your organization

ENT001.description.description: A brief description of your organization's purpose

ENT002.email.description: The user's email address for login and notifications

ENT002.displayName.description: The name shown to other users in the interface

ENT003.name.description: A unique name identifying this role

ENT003.description.description: What this role is responsible for
ENT003.description.example: Manages the engineering team and technical projects

ENT004.name.description: A clear name for this work unit or responsibility

ENT004.description.description: What this function involves and its purpose
ENT004.description.example: Review code submissions for quality and standards

ENT005.name.description: A descriptive name for this process

ENT005.description.example: Steps to onboard new customers from signup to first value

ENT006.title.description: A clear statement of what you want to achieve

ENT006.targetDate.description: When you aim to achieve this goal

ENT007.type.description: The canvas template type (Business Model, Lean, etc.)

ENT008.type.description: The category of resource (Human, Financial, Physical, etc.)
